Branching Barrage.name: Branching Barrage
Branching Barrage.description:
Frequency once per day

Effect Wooden splinters bursts forth from your body. You deal [[/r (floor(@actor.level/2)d6)[piercing]]]{1d6 piercing damage} to all adjacent creatures (@Check[type:reflex|basic:true|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher). At 3rd level, and every 2 levels thereafter, this damage increases by [[/r 1d6]].

I’m Not Crying!.name: I’m Not Crying!
I’m Not Crying!.description:
Frequency once per 10 minutes

Trigger an adjacent creature deals slashing damage to you

Effect the triggering creature must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] save or be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Dazzled]{Dazzled} for 1 round. The DC of the saving throw is equal to your class DC or your spell DC, whichever is higher.

Lichen's Tenacity.name: Lichen's Tenacity
Lichen's Tenacity.description:
You hunker down, focusing all your effort on protecting yourself from extreme temperatures. Until the beginning of your next turn, you gain resistance to cold and fire equal to twice your level, and you can’t act.

@UUID[Compendium.botanical-bestiary.effects.AwLeak2GPIH6E4b5]{Effect: Lichen's Tenacity}

Rose’s Tranquility.name: Rose’s Tranquility
Rose’s Tranquility.description:
Frequency once per day

Effect For 1 minute, all allies within 30 feet of you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against effects that would make them @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Confused]{Confused}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Controlled} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Fascinated]{Fascinated} as well as effects that would magically improve their attitude (such as @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vLA0q0WOK2YPuJs6]{Charm}).

@Compendium[botanical-bestiary.effects.DwxpHXwlTPuXq2wT]{Aura: Rose’s Tranquility}
